decision_conditions:
INFORMATIVE: The applicant is advised that the following condition is inserted to planning permission P082407 and shall be known as condition 32. The condition reads:

CONDITION:  The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

[LBI reg 2407/1]:  [Site location plan; Student Accommodation Supply and Demand Study; Ecological BREEAM Pre-Assessment Report; Ecological Appraisal; Japanese Knotweed Strategy; Archaeological and Built Heritage Assessment; Sunlight and Daylight Study; Air Quality Assessment; Utilities Site Appraisal Report; Student Accommodation Management Proposal
	
[LBI reg 2407/2]:  28360-G; 28360-1; 28360-E and 28360-S  

[LBI reg 2407/3]: Revised application form; Town Planning Statement; Statement of Community Consultation; Sustainable Design & construction Statement; Energy Statement; Transport Assessment; Lighting Impact Assessment; Acoustics Report on Noise and Vibration; Ventilation/Extraction Statement; Phase 1 and II Geoenvironmental Assessment; Preliminary Drainage Assessment;  Construction Statement & Code of Construction Practice; 1684.2.D.300.5000/C and 1684.2.D.300.5001/B  

[LBI reg 2407/5]: Savills Cover letter, 22 May 2009 with Drainage/Water Recycling Reponses e-mail, 21 May 2009; Materials and Construction Impact Reponses e-mail, 20 May 2009; Adaption Response e-mail, 14 May 2009; Access Response e-mail, 21 May 2009; Access Response e-mail, 20 May 2009; Addendum to Design & Access Statement, 21 May 2009; Addendum to Energy Statement; BREEAM Office 2008 Pre-Assessment, May '09; BREEAM Multi-Residential 2008 Pre-Assessment, May '09 

[LBI reg 2407/6]: Design and Access Statement, 4 June 2009 

[LBI reg 2407(MA01)/1]:  G 0107 Rev P9;  G 0301 Rev P9;  G 0303 Rev P9;  G 0305 Rev P9;   G 0201 Rev P9.

[LBI reg: 2407(MA01)/2]:  G 0101 Rev T3; 
 
[LBI reg: 2407(MA01)/3]: G0 100 Rev T7, 102 Rev T3- 105 Rev T3, 106 Rev T4

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
